Speaking & Workshops

Book Dr Adrian Laurence for educational presentations on lifestyle medicine, men's health, and evidence-based strategies for sustainable health.

Speaking Topics

Lifestyle Medicine for Men 35+

Evidence-based approaches to optimizing health, energy, and performance for men over 35.

  • • Sleep optimization strategies
  • • Nutrition and protein timing
  • • Exercise prescription and recovery
  • • Stress management techniques

Behavior Change & Habit Formation

Practical strategies for building sustainable health habits that actually stick.

  • • The psychology of behavior change
  • • Building systems vs. relying on motivation
  • • Overcoming common barriers
  • • Long-term maintenance strategies

Evidence on GLP-1 Class Medications

Educational overview of GLP-1 receptor agonists for healthcare professionals.

  • • Mechanism of action and pharmacology
  • • Clinical indications and evidence
  • • Practical considerations for patient care
  • • Emerging research and applications

Clinician Communication

Improving healthcare provider communication and patient engagement.

  • • Effective patient education strategies
  • • Building therapeutic relationships
  • • Motivational interviewing techniques
  • • Shared decision-making approaches

Presentation Formats

Keynote Presentations

30-60 minute presentations for conferences, corporate events, and professional gatherings.

Interactive Workshops

Hands-on sessions with practical exercises, case studies, and group discussions.

Panel Discussions

Expert panels and Q&A sessions on current topics in lifestyle medicine and men's health.

Recent Speaking Engagements

GLP-1 diabetes obesity pharmacology clinical education

Primary Care Update Conference

20 May 2024 • Wellington, New Zealand

An educational session on the GLP-1 class of medications, their mechanisms of action, clinical applications, and considerations for patient care.

men's health lifestyle medicine evidence-based medicine preventive health

New Zealand Men's Health Summit

15 April 2024 • Auckland, New Zealand

A comprehensive keynote exploring the science behind lifestyle medicine approaches specifically tailored for men over 35, covering sleep, nutrition, exercise, and stress management.

How to Book

Ready to bring evidence-based lifestyle medicine education to your organization? Here's how to get started.

Email to Enquire

Send me an email with details about your event, audience, and requirements. I'll respond within 48 hours.

Email to enquire

What to Include

  • • Event name and date
  • • Location (in-person or virtual)
  • • Audience size and background
  • • Preferred topic or format
  • • Duration and timing
  • • Any specific requirements
